original_text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning, and expounded it by order unto them, saying,
korean_text: 베드로가 그들에게 이 일을 차례로 설명하여

sentences.original_text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 베드로는 그 일을 처음부터 낱낱이 설명하고

sentences.original_text: and expounded it by order unto them
